songs.lyrics:
Good evenin'
I must repeat, and cheat once again
We gon' talk about bitches and hoes
There is somethin wrong with 'em
Especially now (aha)
They want niggas (aha) to give 'em chronic (aha)
And all that shit too (aha)
But bitch (aha)
I said bitch (aha)
I ain't gonna go for it (aha)
Not now (aha)
Not ever (aha) (aha)(aha) (aha)
Let's raise the offerin'
songs.title: Gangsta Sermon
